attributes.action: Increase minimum wage for 18+ year olds to the same as the national living wage
attributes.background:
At the age of 18 you have to pay ADULT prices, if we are having to pay adult prices we should be paid the same! Additionally if we are doing the SAME job as someone 25 we should get the SAME pay! 

Some 18-24 year olds have families etc with bills and rent to pay the same as 25+ year olds!
